title: by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Rural and Community Development and the 
Gaeltacht) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department rural community development gaeltacht) order 2025

title: by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: Jack White, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

Jack White, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Rural and Community Development and the 
Gaeltacht, is appointed as Special Adviser to Jerry Buttimer, Minister of State at 
the Department of Rural and Community Development and the Gaeltacht with 
effect from 25th February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [265] 3
